text: William J. "Wild Bill" Guarnere (April 28, 1923 - March 8, 2014) was an American World War II veteran and author. He was known for being played in the HBO miniseries Band of Brothers. He fought during the Battle of Normandy and at the Battle of the Bulge. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Guarnere died on March 8, 2014 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania from natural causes, aged 90. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American people of World War II Category:Writers from Philadelphia
title: William Guarnere
